text: Dharamkot is a city and a municipal council in the Moga district in the state of Punjab, India. ==Demographics== India census, Dharamkot had a population of 15,399. Males constitute 33% of the population and females 67%. Dharamkot has an average literacy rate of 62%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; male literacy is 70%, and female literacy is 59%. In Dharamkot, 94% of the population is under 66 years of age. Notified Persons of Dharamkot Mr. Kewal Krishan Nohria (Ceo Crompton Greeves) Mr. Roshan Lal Nauhria (Politician and Bussinessman in Newzealand) MR.
